content: sl1 k9 sl bm1 k2 sl em1 yo skp row 11 sl1 k9 sl bm1 k1 k2tog sl em1 3x k2 sl mm to em2 sl em2 yo skp 3x yo k1 yo skp 2x k1 k2tog sl mm to k1 sl bm2 k10 turn em2 sl em2 yo k1 yo skp 2x k1 sl row 5 sl1 k9 sl bm1 k2 sl em1 k1 yo bm2 k10 turn skp 2x k3 sl mm to em2 sl em2 k1 yo skp 2x k2 sl bm2 k10 turn repeat above 12 row 18 more times row 7 sl1 k9 sl bm1 k2 sl em1 k2 yo skp k4 sl mm to em2 sl em2 k2 yo skp border k3 sl bm2 k10 turn sl1 k to end of row turn repeat this row 9 sl1 k9 sl bm1 k2 sl em1 k2tog row until border measures 2 in 5 cm yo k1 yo skp k3 sl mm to em2 sl em2 removing all m s as they appear bobble k2tog yo k1 yo skp k2 sl bm2 k10 turn cut yarn leaving sufficient length to for row 11 if using markers you must weave in tail remove ems and mms sl the next st to the right-hand needle replace ems and mms finishing to the left-hand needle and slip_stitch back to weave in ends block to measurements left -hand needle see video tutorial for demonstration revised august 2025 ©2022 julie peng p 4 lace chart repeat 19 times key k p k2tog skp sk2p slip_stitch yo if you run into any questions while working on this project please dm me on instagram @yellow- cayenne or email at yellowcayenne@icloud com happy knitting this pattern is for personal non-commercial use only please do not share sell or duplicate this pattern in digital or printed format or sell a finished product using this pattern show and tell is always fun if you would like to share post your work-in-progress and finished blanket on instagram don t forget to tag this project #raeslace and me @yellowcayenne i can t wait to see your version of rae s lace revised august 2025 ©2022 julie peng p 5
